original_title: お姉チャンバラ THE MOVIE vorteX
overview: Sisters Aya and Saki put aside their rivalry and go toe-to-toe with Himiko and her band of zombies. The evil Himiko needs the blood of the young girls to restore her youth, while the sisters need to stop Himiko to save mankind ...
tagline: Bikini Clad Zombie Slayer Aya Is Back!
title: Oneechanbara THE MOVIE vorteX
